title: Stynger
summaries: The Stynger is a Hardmode, post-Golem launcher that auto-fires Stynger Bolts, which travel at high velocity and explode upon impact with an enemy or solid tile, (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) dealing 200% or double the weapon's base damage (90 damage) upon directly hitting a target. Stynger Bolts deal splash damage to enemies within the radius of the explosion while releasing several shrapnel fragments that separate from the initial bolt, travel in long horizontal arcs, and cause additional smaller explosions that inflict the weapon's base damage.

The Stynger has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/7 (14.29%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/8 (12.5%) chance of being dropped by Golem. When dropped, the Stynger is always accompanied by 60 to 99 Stynger Bolts. Additional Stynger Bolts can be purchased from the Witch Doctor or Arms Dealer for 75 CC each when the Stynger is in the player's inventory.

statistics.Damage: 45 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 43 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Ranged)
statistics.Tooltip:
Shoots an explosive bolt
Does extra damage on a direct hit
statistics.Sell: 7 GC
